name: h5-parcel-demo
description: 用 parcel + typescript + sass 来开发单页活动的模版，用 puppeteer 来做界面自动化测试

scripts.build:test: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=test parcel build ./src/index.html -d dist_test --public-url ./ && node imagemin.config.js
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build ./src/index.html -d dist_prod --public-url ./ && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node imagemin.config.js
scripts.bp:test: npm run build:test && npm run preview:test
scripts.bp:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run preview:prod
scripts.upload:test: npm run build:test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test node config/project.upload.js
scripts.upload:prod: npm run build:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node config/project.upload.js

author: CYY
